item.title: [mic] Sigarda's Vanguard
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flash

Flying

Whenever Sigarda's Vanguard enters the battlefield or attacks, choose any number of creatures with different powers. Those creatures gain double strike until end of turn.

item.title: [mic] Ruinous Intrusion
item.description:
Instant

Exile target artifact or enchantment. Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the mana value of the permanent exiled this way.

item.title: [mic] Moorland Rescuer
item.description:
Creature — Human Knight

When Moorland Rescuer dies, return any number of other creature cards with total power X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is Moorland Rescuer's power. Exile Moorland Rescuer.

item.title: [mic] Kyler, Sigardian Emissary
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Cleric

Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kyler, Sigardian Emissary.

Other humans you control get +1/+1 for each counter on Kyler, Sigardian Emissary.

item.title: [mic] Kurbis, Harvest Celebrant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Treefolk

Kurbis, Harvest Celebrant enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it.

Remove a +1/+1 counter from Kurbis: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to another target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.

item.title: [mic] Heronblade Elite
item.description:
Creature — Human Warrior

Vigilance

Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Heronblade Elite.

{T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is Heronblade Elite's power.

item.title: [mic] Curse of Conformity
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Nonlegendary creatures enchanted player controls have base power and toughness 3/3 and lose all creature types.

item.title: [mic] Curse of Clinging Webs
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever a nontoken creature enchanted player controls dies, exile it and you create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

item.title: [mic] Celestial Judgment
item.description:
Sorcery

For each different power among creatures on the battlefield, choose a creature with that power. Destroy each creature not chosen this way.

item.title: [mic] Celebrate the Harvest
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the number of different powers among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [mic] Hordewing Skaab
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

Flying

Other Zombies you control have flying.

Whenever one or more Zombies you control deal combat damage to one or more of your opponents, you may draw cards equal to the number of opponents dealt damage this way. If you do, discard that many cards.

item.title: [mic] Ravenous Rotbelly
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

When Ravenous Rotbelly enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice up to three Zombies. When you sacrifice one or more Zombies this way, each opponent sacrifices that many creatures.

item.title: [mic] Tomb Tyrant
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Noble

Other Zombies you control get +1/+1.

{2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Return a Zombie creature card at random from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your turn and only if there are at least three Zombie creature cards in your graveyard.

item.title: [mic] Curse of the Restless Dead
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

Whenever a land enters the battlefield under enchanted player's control, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mic] Curse of Unbinding
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura Curse

Enchant player

At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield under your control. That player puts the rest of the revealed cards into their graveyard.

item.title: [mic] Prowling Geistcatcher
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue

Whenever you sacrifice another creature, exile it. If that creature was a token, put a +1/+1 counter on Prowling Geistcatcher.

When Prowling Geistcatcher leaves the battlefield, return each card exiled with it to the battlefield under your control.

item.title: [mic] Shadow Kin
item.description:
Creature — Shapeshifter

Flash

At the beginning of your upkeep, each player mills three cards. You may exile a creature card from among the cards milled this way. If you do, Shadow Kin becomes a copy of that card, except it has this ability.

item.title: [mic] Drown in Dreams
item.description:
Instant

Choose one. If you control a commander as you cast this spell, you may choose both.

• Target player draws X cards.

• Target player mills twice X cards.

item.title: [mic] Ghouls' Night Out
item.description:
Sorcery

For each player, choose a creature card in that player's graveyard. Put those cards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types and they gain decayed. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mic] Empty the Laboratory
item.description:
Sorcery

Sacrifice X Zombies, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a number of Zombie creature cards equal to the number of Zombies sacrificed this way. Put those cards onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [mic] Crowded Crypt
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {B}.

Whenever a creature you control dies, put a corpse counter on Crowded Crypt.

{4}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Crowded Crypt: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed for each corpse counter on Crowded Crypt. (A creature with decayed can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mic] Cleaver Skaab
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

{3}, {T}, Sacrifice another Zombie: Create two tokens that are copies of the sacrificed creature.

item.title: [mic] Gorex, the Tombshell
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Zombie Turtle

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile a number of creature cards from your graveyard. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each card exiled this way.

Deathtouch

Whenever Gorex, the Tombshell attacks or dies, choose a card at random exiled with Gorex and put that card into its owner's hand.

item.title: [mic] Eloise, Nephalia Sleuth
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue

Whenever another creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Whenever you sacrifice a token, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

item.title: [mic] Zombie Apocalypse
item.description:
Sorcery

Return all Zombie creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped, then destroy all Humans.

item.title: [mid] Component Collector
item.description:
Creature — Homunculus

If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Component Collector enters the battlefield.

Whenever day becomes night or night becomes day, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.

item.title: [mid] Devious Cover-Up
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.

item.title: [mid] Drownyard Amalgam
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Horror

When Drownyard Amalgam enters the battlefield, target player mills three cards. (They put the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.)

{2}{U}: Drownyard Amalgam can't be blocked this turn.

item.title: [mid] Falcon Abomination
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Bird

Flying

When Falcon Abomination enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Flip the Switch
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell unless its controller pays {4}. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Geistwave
item.description:
Instant

Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you controlled that permanent, draw a card.

item.title: [mid] Otherworldly Gaze
item.description:
Instant

Look at the top three cards of your library. Put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest back on top of your library in any order.

Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Revenge of the Drowned
item.description:
Instant

Target creature's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Shipwreck Sifters
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

When Shipwreck Sifters enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

Whenever you discard a Spirit card or a card with disturb, put a +1/+1 counter on Shipwreck Sifters.

item.title: [mid] Unblinking Observer
item.description:
Creature — Homunculus

{T}: Add {U}. Spend this mana only to pay a disturb cost or cast an instant or sorcery spell.

item.title: [mid] Bat Whisperer
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Bat Whisperer enters the battlefield, if an opponent lost life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.

item.title: [mid] Blood Pact
item.description:
Instant

Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

item.title: [mid] Crawl from the Cellar
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Zombie you control.

Flashback {3}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Duress
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

item.title: [mid] Morkrut Behemoth
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Giant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {1}{B}.

Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

item.title: [mid] No Way Out
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent discards two cards. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

item.title: [mid] Novice Occultist
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

When Novice Occultist dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

item.title: [mid] Olivia's Midnight Ambush
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it's night, that creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead.

item.title: [mid] Rotten Reunion
item.description:
Instant

Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed. (It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Vampire Interloper
item.description:
Creature — Vampire Scout

Flying

Vampire Interloper can't block.

item.title: [mid] Abandon the Post
item.description:
Sorcery

Up to two target creatures can't block this turn.

Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Ardent Elementalist
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Ardent Elementalist enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [mid] Burn the Accursed
item.description:
Instant

Burn the Accused deals 5 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [mid] Electric Revelation
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards.

Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.)

item.title: [mid] Moonrager's Slash
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {2} less to cast if it's night.

Moonrager's Slash deals 3 damage to any target.
